terms.name: contact affiliation
terms.value: School of Veterinary Medicine and Biomedical Sciences  University of Nebraska-Lincoln, Lincoln, Nebraska, USA

description: Total cytosolic protein fractions of Staphylococcus aureus strains SA564, SA564-ΔhptRS, SA564-ΔccpA and SA564-ΔhptRS/ccpA were analyzed by LC-MSE .  Five biological replicates of each strain, cultivated in TSB and TSB-dex, during the exponential (2h) and post exponential (6h) growth phases (80 samples) were investigated.

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: Staphylococcus aureus, CcpA, Carbon Catabolite, Glucose, HptR, HptS, HptRS, Exponential growth phase, Postexponential growth phase

terms.name: Reference
terms.value: Reed JM, Olson S, Brees DF, Griffin CE, Grove RA, Davis PJ, Kachman SD, Adamec J, Somerville GA. Coordinated regulation of transcription by CcpA and the Staphylococcus aureus two-component system HptRS. PLoS One. 2018 13(12):e0207161

title: Coordinated regulation of transcription by CcpA and the Staphylococcus aureus two component system HptRS
